translated: The forward and reverse order of the ideas, the exposition in triplets, the exposition in couplets

original: 15.26. Nahetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika🔽Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetu sa hetuka duka kusala ttika  na hetum sa hetukam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa hetukaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  na hetum sa hetukam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa hetukaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: The section on the root cause and rootless, the wholesome triad🔽With a root cause and with root cause, a wholesome idea being the condition, an idea without root cause and without root cause arises, a wholesome idea, through root-cause condition. In the case of root cause, there is one … in the case of the unspecific, there is one.🔽With a root cause and with root cause, an unwholesome idea being the condition, an idea without root cause and without root cause arises, an unwholesome idea, through root-cause condition. In the case of root cause, there is one … in the case of the unspecific, there is one.

original: Nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nahetu naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum ahetukam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na hetu na ahetukaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With a root cause and with root cause, an indeterminate idea being the condition, an idea without root cause and without root cause arises, an indeterminate idea, through root-cause condition. In the case of root cause, there is one … in the case of the unspecific, there is one.
The section on the root cause is completed.
